where 1 = 1
apply_no = #applyNo#
user_id = #userId#
insurant_name = #insurantName#
certi_type = #certiType#
certi_no = #certiNo#
effective_date = #effectiveDate#
effective_date >= #effectiveStartDate#
effective_date <= #effectiveEndDate#
sub_company = #subCompany#
department = #department#
is_deleted = #isDeleted#
is_effective = #isEffective#
policy_source_type = #policySourceType#
limit #start#,#limit#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO group_insurance_insurant_extension( id, apply_no,group_policy_id, user_id, insurant_family_seq, insurant_inner_seq, staff_seq_no, creator, gmt_created, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, insurant_name, certi_type, certi_no, policy_id,is_effective, trade_no, birthday, social_security_no, medical_insurance_place, gender, base_certi_type, base_certi_no, relation_to_staff, insurance_plan, staff_type, phone, email, effective_date,expiry_date, data_type, sub_company, department, salary, nationality, household_location, marital_status, nation, occupational_code, occupational_type, position, transfer_account_bank, account_holder, account_no, entry_date, work_experience, staff_no,is_renewal,person_insurance_type, remark,project_expiry_date,project_name,project_code, insurant_type,register_address,has_social_insurance,extra_info,organization_code,work_place,individual_account_amount, policy_source_type) VALUES ( #id#, #applyNo#,#groupPolicyId#, #userId#, #insurantFamilySeq#, #insurantInnerSeq#, #staffSeqNo#, #creator#, NOW(), #modifier#, NOW(), 'N', #insurantName#, #certiType#, #certiNo#,#policyId#,#isEffective#,#tradeNo#, #birthday#, #socialSecurityNo#, #medicalInsurancePlace#, #gender#, #baseCertiType#, #baseCertiNo#, #relationToStaff#, #insurancePlan#, #staffType#, #phone#, #email#, #effectiveDate#,#expiryDate#, #dataType#, #subCompany#, #department#, #salary#, #nationality#, #householdLocation#, #maritalStatus#, #nation#, #occupationalCode#, #occupationalType#, #position#, #transferAccountBank#, #accountHolder#, #accountNo#, #entryDate#, #workExperience#, #staffNo#, #isRenewal#,#personInsuranceType#, #remark#, #projectExpiryDate#, #projectName#, #projectCode#, #insurantType#, #registerAddress#, #hasSocialInsurance#, #extraInfo#, #organizationCode#,#workPlace#,#individualAccountAmount#, #policySourceType#)

sqlMap.select:
SELECT
FROM group_insurance_insurant_extension a1 WHERE id = #id#
SELECT COUNT(id) AS num FROM group_insurance_insurant_extension

SELECT COUNT(id) AS num FROM group_insurance_insurant_extension a1 where a1.is_deleted ='N' and a1.is_effective ='Y'
apply_no = #applyNo#
group_policy_id = #groupPolicyId#
a1.relation_to_staff in
#typeArray[]#

apply_no = #applyNo#

relation_to_staff = #relationToStaff#
